textBeforeTable: Model Measurements US sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 38in / 96.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Dry clean. 54% polyester/38% viscose/8% elastane. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer In 2007, style makers Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen collaborated to create Elizabeth and James. This line merges downtown cool with uptown class, and mixes pieces that possess soft, feminine detail with others offering a more tailored, masculine edge. Impeccable construction and vintage inspiration are hallmarks of their fashion-forward label, which includes newly introduced lines of jewelry and shoes, not to mention clothing that runs the gamut from classic blazers to au courant jumpsuits and rompers. See all Elizabeth and James reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
